name: Tunnelizer
short_description: Tunnelizer is an application suite that allows you to tunnel TCP and UDP traffic through a firewall or proxy server. Communication between the tunnel ends can be either direct or through a SOCKS or HTTP proxy server, and can be optionally encrypted.
